arts.ttl: Truth over missing Rangers pair revealed, Matondo and Cortes directly addressed, Danilo injury update

arts.sum: Watch the best of the action as Rangers beat Aberdeen 3-0 in the Scottish Premiership.

arts.ttl: How Aberdeen's season has become record-breaking for all wrong reasons
arts.sum: Aberdeen had 10 wins from their first 11 Scottish Premiership games. Now they're winless in 12. What has gone wrong?

arts.ttl: Aberdeen now breaking records for wrong reasons
arts.sum: Aberdeen had 10 wins from their first 11 Scottish Premiership games. Now they're winless in 12. What has gone wrong?

arts.ttl: Rangers 'better as players start to understand things'
arts.sum: Manager Philippe Clement praises the attitude of his Rangers players in their 3-0 Scottish Premiership win against Aberdeen.

arts.ttl: Aberdeen 'need to stabilise amid challenging time'
arts.sum: Aberdeen manager Jimmy Thelin says his team need to get better if they are to arrest their winless run.
Highlights of the Scottish Premiership match between Rangers and Aberdeen.

arts.ttl: Reaction & analysis as Rangers beat meek Aberdeen
arts.sum: We get reaction from the managers and Sportsound team after Rangers beat Aberdeen 3-0.

arts.ttl: 'They weren't ruthless enough!' | Boyd, Considine, Sutton react to Rangers victory
arts.sum: Kris Boyd, Andrew Considine and Chris Sutton share their reaction to Rangers 3-0 win over Aberdeen. All were in agreement that Rangers had full control of the game with Aberdeen showing a very poor performance.

arts.ttl: Kris Boyd goes for Aberdeen jugular in astonishing rant – he demands serious question of Thelin after 'embarrassing' defeat
arts.sum: The Swede arrived in Scotland and hit the ground running but the wheels have dramatically fallen off in the Granite City
